oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Social History as Commitment: On the Occasion of Klaus Tenfelde’s 75th Birthday
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kocka, Jürgen
Strotmann, Vivian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Klaus Tenfelde
life and works
Social History
House for the History of the Ruhr
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the translation of a laudation to Klaus Tenfelde that was presented by Jürgen Kocka at the Institute for Social Movements of Ruhr University Bochum on 20 November 2019, on the occasion of the annual celebration of the foundation of the Society for the History of the Ruhr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Moving the Social; Vol. 63 (2020): Cross Movement Mobilisation — Perspectives from the Global North and South; 163-169
